ygData.subject: Re: RE: Aviak Charms.
ygData.msgSnippet: Sold loot myself on the Rathe last week.  and YES the going rate was 100plat. Thanos Kinslayor,  Necromancer     The Rathe ... From: Jared Hughes
ygData.messageBody:
Sold loot myself on the Rathe last week. and YES the going rate was
100plat.

Thanos Kinslayor, Necromancer The Rathe

>>> "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...> 08/30 7:56 PM >>>
From: "Jared Hughes" <jaredh@...>


I dont know about other servers, but on Mith Marr when someone
happens
across
a charm they dont want, they shout out its location for whomever
wants it.
Never seen one sold for anywhere near 60 plat, but then again I guess
not
everyone is as generous as those nearest the Light Bringer :)


i play on veeshan and one night last week when i was hunting in south
karana
some player was /auctioning to loot an aviak charm for 100pp, for
over 2
hours... i guess she finally got it, but they are worth it on
veeshan, never
really got into making the crafted stuff yet..

Veldra Rae`lynn
lvl 28 magician
Veeshan


Renaldo Rallentandoof the 23rd string
Valharick Healsomany of the 20th level
